channel.title: Build Showoff
channel.description:
I couldn't see a thread like this (on the first page, fuck you), so here goes.
Post your rigs, screenshots preferable due to me not trusting any of you.
[img]http://dl.getdropbox.com/u/1751617/rig.png[/img]

item.title: Build Showoff
item.dc:creator: @chrisn2323 chrisn2323
item.description:
@chrisn2323 wrote:

[quote=“xEnt, post:13, topic:295883”]yeah another 4gig of DDR3 ram over here in aus is only 85$, ill buy another set to boost epeen.

I’m thinking instead of saving up for the 4890, i should be able to save up a little extra and buy ATI’s next gen cards 5xxx which atm a benchmark has proven the 5870 single card is almost faster than the 4870x2

ATI gonna steal this next war imo[/quote]
yeah DX11 is also around the corner too so I would wait.

Read full topic

item.title: Build Showoff
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

[quote=“la­wl, post:10, topic:295883”][quote author=sanga282 link=topic=391914.msg2919723#msg2919723 date=1250694872]

when i get mine it will rape yours, overclocked i7 @3.4Ghz 896MB GTX 260 6GB corsair RAM bluray reader etc etc

but it isnt your own build

was going to be, but oddly works out cheaper if they build it
[/quote]
not odd at all. they get the parts a lot cheaper cuz they buy it in bulk[/quote]
normally they charge like tonnes for building it coz they are faggits, but overclockers is a bargain

Read full topic

I’m thinking instead of saving up for the 4890, i should be able to save up a little extra and buy ATI’s next gen cards 5xxx which atm a benchmark has proven the 5870 single card is almost faster than the 4870x2

item.title: Build Showoff
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

[quote=“Ollie, post:11, topic:295883”]Speljohan has a nice setup, though 8GB is waste unless you edit video/audio! Though i couldnt complain.

i got Intel Quad 8800 @ 2.88Ghz, 4Gb Ram, 500GB HDD, 9800GT, 64bit W7

and a cheap £1.99 keyboard and mouse, FTW. best keyboard & mouse.[/quote]Agree with keyboard/mouse ye. ps i like havin 8gb cus its pretty future-safe + cheap

Read full topic
